text: Anthurium albovirescens is a species of plant in the family Araceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador albovirescens Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1905
title: Anthurium albovirescens
